static from_polydfe(polymorphic: list | numpy.ndarray, n_sites: float, n_div: float)

Create Spectra from polyDFE specification which treats the number of mutational target sites and the divergence counts separately. Note that the monomorphic counts are included here, although ignored.

Parameters:

  • polymorphic (list | ndarray) – Polymorphic counts

  • n_sites (float) – Total number of sites

  • n_div (float) – Number of divergence counts

Return type:

Spectrum

Returns:

Spectrum

static from_polymorphic(data: list | numpy.ndarray)

Create Spectrum from polymorphic counts only.

Parameters:

data (list | ndarray) – Polymorphic counts

Return type:

Spectrum

Returns:

Spectrum

Whether n_div was specified.

Returns:

Whether n_div was specified

is_folded()

Check if the site-frequency spectrum is folded.

Return type:

bool

Returns:

True if folded, False otherwise

Returns:

normalize()

Normalize SFS so that all non-monomorphic counts add up to 1. :rtype: Spectrum :return:

plot(show: bool = True, file: Optional[str] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, show_monomorphic: bool = False, kwargs_legend: dict = {'prop': {'size': 8}}, ax: Optional[matplotlib.axes._axes.Axes] = None)

Plot spectrum.

Parameters:

  • show (bool) – Whether to show plot

  • file (Optional[str]) – File to save plot to

  • title (Optional[str]) – Title of plot

  • show_monomorphic (bool) – Whether to show monomorphic counts

  • kwargs_legend (dict) – Keyword arguments passed to plt.legend()

  • ax (Optional[Axes]) – Axes to plot on

Return type:

Axes

Axes

plot_heatmap(ax: Optional[matplotlib.axes._axes.Axes] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, max_abs: Optional[float] = None, log_scale: bool = False, cbar_kws: Dict = {'pad': -0.05}, fill_diagonal_entries: bool = False, show: bool = True)

Plot as a heatmap.

Parameters:

  • title (Optional[str]) –

  • ax (Optional[Axes]) – Axes to plot on.

  • max_abs (Optional[float]) – Maximum absolute value to plot.

  • log_scale (bool) – Use log scale.

  • cbar_kws (Dict) – Keyword arguments for color bar.

  • fill_diagonal_entries (bool) – Fill diagonal entries.

  • show (bool) – Whether to show the plot.

Return type:

Axes

Returns:

Axes.

plot(ax: Optional[matplotlib.axes._axes.Axes] = None, title: Optional[str] = None, max_abs: Optional[float] = None, vmin: Optional[float] = None, vmax: Optional[float] = None, fill_diagonal_entries: bool = False, fill_value: float = nan, log_scale: bool = False, show: bool = True)

Plot as a surface.

Parameters:

  • title (Optional[str]) –

  • ax (Optional[Axes]) – Axes to plot on.

  • max_abs (Optional[float]) – Maximum absolute value to plot.

  • vmin (Optional[float]) – Minimum value to plot.

  • vmax (Optional[float]) – Maximum value to plot.

  • fill_diagonal_entries (bool) – Fill diagonal entries.

  • fill_value (float) – Value to fill diagonal entries with.

  • log_scale (bool) – Use log scale.

  • show (bool) – Whether to show the plot.

Return type:

Axes

Returns:

Axes.
